Step_Description.Step_Description_label: From the Windows file explorer, create the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts directory
Create A.txt and C.txt text files in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts
Create B.ppt and D.ppt Powerpoint files in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts
In Orchestra Framework, create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Orchestra" category
In the variable viewer, add the FileSystem directory "D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts" to the "ArtefactPath" variable
Add a CC UCM Live Dynamic environment to the Artefact variable, containing text files E.txt and G.txt as well as Powerpoint files F.ppt and H.ppt
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOrchestraFramework" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOffice" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
In the context viewer, right click on the "AdminContext" context and select "Set as current context"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: In the context viewer, the "AdminContext" is displayed in bold

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the Orchestra Explorer, click on the refresh icon

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Explorer displays two artefact types : "Text" and "Powerpoint"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the bottom arrow and select "Group by..." -> "Flat"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: Artefact types have been removed. All artefacts are displayed at the same level

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the bottom arrow and select "Sort..." -> "Name"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Explorer displays artefacts in the following order : A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the bottom arrow and select "Sort..." -> "Environment"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Explorer displays the following artefacts : E, F, G, H (no special order) then A, B, C, D (no special order)

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the bottom arrow and select "Sort..." -> "Type"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Explorer displays the following artefacts : B, D, F, H (no special order) then A, C, E, G (no special order)

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: From the Windows file explorer, create the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts directory
Create A.txt and C.txt text files in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts
Create B.ppt and D.ppt Powerpoint files in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts
In Orchestra Framework, create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Use ODM variables in path to artefacts in File System environment
Right-click on the "Orchestra" category and select 'New' -> 'Variable' in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: In the variable viewer, a new 'Variable0' variable has been added to to the 'Orchestra' category

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Right-click on the 'Variable0' variable and select 'Edit' in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Edit variable' dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Change variable name to 'ArtefactsDirectory'
Set variable value to "D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts"
Click on the 'Finish button'

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The 'Edit variable' dialog box disappears. In the variable viewer, the 'Variable0' variable has been renamed to 'ArtefactsDirectory' and is valued "D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the variable viewer, right-click on the ArtefactPath variable and select 'Edit' in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Edit overriding variable' dailog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the 'Add' button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Setting up environment' dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select 'File System' -> 'Directories in file system' environment in the envrionement tree
Click on the 'Next >' button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Choose directory to include' page is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the 'Add' button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A new entry in the directory list is create and selected

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the 'Variables…' button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Variable browser' is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select variable 'AdminContext' -> 'Orchestra' -> 'ArtefactsDirectory' in the variable tree
Click on the 'Ok' button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The 'Variable browser disappears. In the 'Choose directory to include' page, the modified directory entry is now valued '${odm:\Orchestra\ArtefactsDirectory}'

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the Finish button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The 'Setting up environment' dialog box disappears

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Add a CC UCM Live Dynamic environment to the Artefact variable, containing text files E.txt and G.txt as well as Powerpoint files F.ppt and H.ppt
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOrchestraFramework" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOffice" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
In the context viewer, right click on the "AdminContext" context and select "Set as current context"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: In the context viewer, the "AdminContext" is displayed in bold

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the Orchestra Explorer, click on the refresh icon

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: By default, artefacts are grouped by type. The Orchestra Explorer displays two artefact types : "Text" and "Powerpoint"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the bottom arrow and select "Sort..." -> "Name"
Click on the bottom arrow and select "Group by..." -> "Environment"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Explorer displays two environments: CC UCM Live Dynamic and FS

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the top tree, unfold the "CCUCM Live Dynamic" artefact environement

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: Artefacts are listed in the following order : E,F,G,H

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the top tree, unfold the "FS" artefact environement

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: Artefacts are listed in the following order : A, B, C, D

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the bottom arrow and select "Group by..." -> "Flat"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: Artefacts are listed in no special category and are sorted by name, by default : A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the bottom arrow and select "Group by..." -> "Type"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: By default, artefacts are grouped by type. The Orchestra Explorer displays two artefact types : "Text" and "Powerpoint"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the top tree, unfold the "Powerpoint" artefact type

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: Artefacts are listed in the following order : B, D, F, H

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the top tree, unfold the "Powerpoint" artefact type

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: Artefacts are listed in the following order : A, C, E, G

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: From the Windows file explorer, create the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts directory
From the Windows file explorer, create the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts\Doc directory
Create a Text.txt text file in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts
Create a Powerpoint.ppt Powerpoint file in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts\Doc
In Orchestra Framework, create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Orchestra" category
In the variable viewer, add the FileSystem directory "D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts" to the "ArtefactPath" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOrchestraFramework" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOrcherstraOffice" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
In the context viewer, right click on the "AdminContext" context and select "Set as current context"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: In the context viewer, the "AdminContext" is displayed in bold

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the Orchestra Explorer, click on the refresh icon

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Explorer displays two artefact types : "Text" and "Powerpoint"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Type "Power" in the name filter

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Text" artefact type is no longer visible in the Orchestra Explorer. The "Powerpoint" artefact type is unfolded. A "Doc/Powerpoint" artefact is displayed in bold

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Clean the name filter

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Explorer displays two artefact types : "Text" and "Powerpoint"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Type "T" in the name filter

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Powerpoint" artefact type is no longer visible in the Orchestra Explorer. The "Text" artefact type is unfolded. A "Text" artefact is displayed in bold

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: From the Windows file explorer, create the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts directory
From the Windows file explorer, create the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts\Doc directory
Create a OF_Text.txt text file in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts
Create a OF_Powerpoint.ppt Powerpoint file in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts\Doc
In Orchestra Framework, create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Orchestra" category
In the variable viewer, add the FileSystem directory "D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts" to the "ArtefactPath" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOrchestraFramework" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOrcherstraOffice" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
In the context viewer, right click on the "AdminContext" context and select "Set as current context"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: In the context viewer, the "AdminContext" is displayed in bold. The Orchestra Explorer is empty

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the Orchestra Explorer, click on the refresh icon

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Explorer displays two artefact types : "Text" and "Powerpoint"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the folding mode icon

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Explorer splits itself up into two trees

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the top tree, unfold the "Powerpoint" artefact type

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Doc" directory is displayed within the "Powerpoint" artefact type

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Doc" directory

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "OF_Powerpoint" artefact is displayed in the bottom tree

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the top tree, click on the "Text" artefact type

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "OF_Text" artefact is displayed in the bottom tree

TestCase.TestCase_Title: Display root artefacts with respect to current context

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: From the Windows file explorer, create the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts directory
From the Windows file explorer, create the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts2 directory
Create a OF_Text.txt text file in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts
Create a OF_Powerpoint.ppt Powerpoint file in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts2
In Orchestra Framework, create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Orchestra" category
In the variable viewer, add the FileSystem directory "D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts" to the "ArtefactPath" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOrchestraFramework" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOrcherstraOffice" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
In Orchestra Framework, create an administrator context called "AdminContext2" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Unfold the "AdminContext2" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Orchestra" category
In the variable viewer, add the FileSystem directory "D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts2" to the "ArtefactPath" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOrchestraFramework" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOrcherstraOffice" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
In the context viewer, right click on the "AdminContext" context and select "Set as current context"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: In the context viewer, the "AdminContext" is displayed in bold

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the Orchestra Explorer, click on the refresh icon

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Explorer displays one artefact type : "Text"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Unfold the "Text" artefact type

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "OF_Text" artefact has been discovered

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the context viewer, right click on the "AdminContext2" context and select "Set as current context"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: In the context viewer, the "AdminContext2" is displayed in bold.

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the Orchestra Explorer, click on the refresh icon

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Explorer displays one artefact type : "Powerpoint"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Unfold the "Powerpoint" artefact type

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "OF_Powerpoint" artefact has been discovered

TestCase.TestCase_Title: Configure default 'Sort by' and 'Group by' options

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Remove Orchestra Framework workspace %APPDATA%\Roaming\Orchestra\OrchestraFramework\workspace
Launch The Orchestra Framework
In the Orchestra Explorer, click on the bottom arrow and select "Group by..."

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: By default, the artefacts are grouped by "Type"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the Orchestra Explorer, click on the bottom arrow and select "Sort by..."

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: By default, the artefacts are sorted by "Environment"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Window" menu and select "Preferences"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Preferences" dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Orchestra Explorer" entry
In the "Orchestra Explorer" preferences", select "Name" as "Default Sort Criterion"
Select "Environment" as "Default 'Group by' Criterion"
Click on the "Ok" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Preferences" dialog box disappears

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Quit the Orchestra Framework
Launch The Orchestra Framework
In the Orchestra Explorer, click on the bottom arrow and select "Group by..."

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: By default, the artefacts are grouped by "Environment"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the Orchestra Explorer, click on the bottom arrow and select "Sort by..."

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: By default, the artefacts are sorted by "Name"
